article:
Never give up! That is one lesson I learned when I was very young. At the age of four, I started school. It was _ because I couldn't talk to other kids. Maybe I was shy because I _ got used to talking with others. I only knew Spanish, and English was just a mixture  of _ .When the teacher spoke, the words became faster and faster. I was unable to _ . I didn't know what to do. I sometimes felt like crying, but I kept telling myself never to give up . 
Soon I started to learn English. _ the end of year I could understand, read, speak and write English. The next year I met my friend Erick. It was his _ year of school and he didn't know English, so I started to _ him this difficult language. We kept learning more and more every year and now we are _ very good English speakers. I also began teaching my two young sisters.
Now I'm learning Japanese. It may be a little _ but I will keep at it. No matter how hard something is, I never give up.
Nothing is difficult in the world if you put your heart into it.
